block.p: Lalyn Read Ottley, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Philip G. Ottley of Hobe Sound, Fla., was married there yesterday to Norman Martin Kenyon, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George N. Kenyon Jr. of Katonah, N.Y. The Rev. Seymour St. John performed the Episcopal ceremony at Christ Memorial Chapel.

Mrs. Kenyon graduated from St. George's School in Newport, R.I., and Colby College. She is a retail trader for Fidelity Investments in Boston. She was presented in 1982 at the Debutante Cotillion and Christmas Ball in New York. Her father is the president of PGO Development, a real-estate investment and development company in Hobe Sound and Sun Valley, Idaho.

The bridegroom, a graduate of Kenyon College, owns PACC Ltd., a construction management company in New York. His mother, Jean S. Kenyon, is a lawyer in Bedford Village, N.Y. His father is the assistant general counsel for Trans World Airlines in Mount Kisco, N.Y.

Her father is the president of PGO Development, a real-estate investment and development company in Hobe Sound and Sun Valley, Idaho.
